description: You gain a poise meter that absorbs incoming melee attacks.  Dodging or taking melee damage reduces your poise, and when it reaches zero your stance is broken, causing you to take increased damage until you regain your footing.
If your poise meter is full, you take 60% less damage from ballistic attacks.
Waiting actions refill your stance.  All movement actions reduce your stance by 1.
If your stance meter is full, any successful block or parry will stagger your attacker for 2 turns.
You stamina regeneration is tripled while stance broken.
Your regain poise on every automatic movement action you perform.
